content:
Here is the final report:

Desired Skills, Knowledge, and Qualifications for an Instructional Designer:

1. Instructional design models & principles (e.g. ADDIE, Dick and Carey) - MATCH: "using principles and practices of instructional design"
2. adult learning theory - MATCH: "using principles and practices of instructional design and adult learning theory."
3. Organizational development - NOT MATCH
4. Accessing and analyzing DATA - NOT MATCH
5. Theories of leadership - NOT MATCH
6. Gamification - NOT MATCH
7. Blended learning techniques - NOT MATCH
8. Formative and summative evaluation - NOT MATCH
9. AR/VR Environments - NOT MATCH
10. Agile methodology (e.g. Scrum) - NOT MATCH
11. Interface design - NOT MATCH
12. Classroom-based technology integration techniques - NOT MATCH
13. Human resources management - NOT MATCH
14. Professional development - NOT MATCH
15. Customer service - NOT MATCH
16. Motivation theories (e.g. ARCS) - NOT MATCH
17. Markup languages (e.g. HTML/XHTML/XML) - NOT MATCH
18. Assessment methods (e.g. criterion-referenced) - NOT MATCH
19. Online/blended programme management - NOT MATCH
20. Instructional simulation and game design - NOT MATCH
21. 3D modelling tools (e.g. Maya) - NOT MATCH
22. SWOT analysis - NOT MATCH
23. Project management software (e.g. Microsoft Project) - NOT MATCH
24. Learning object standards (e.g. SCORM) - NOT MATCH
25. Laws, policies and procedures in training programmes - NOT MATCH
26. Cloud technologies - NOT MATCH
27. Business intelligence (e.g. SAP BW) - NOT MATCH
28. Programming languages (e.g. C++) - NOT MATCH
29. Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) - NOT MATCH
30. Social media technologies (e.g. Twitter) - NOT MATCH
31. Web design principles - NOT MATCH
32. Assessment software (e.g. Respondus) - NOT MATCH
33. Audio software (e.g. Audacity) - NOT MATCH
34. Streaming video technology (e.g. Windows Media Server) - NOT MATCH
35. Project management principles (e.g. PMBOK) - NOT MATCH
36. Industry Standard - NOT MATCH
37. Virtual classrooms (e.g. Wimba or Elluminate! Live) - NOT MATCH
38. Virtual environments (e.g. SecondLife) - NOT MATCH
39. Cognitive learning theory (e.g. Cognitive Load Theory) - NOT MATCH
40. Constructivism - NOT MATCH
41. Mobile learning platforms (e.g. Android) - NOT MATCH
42. Synchronous distance learning methodologies (e.g. Blackboard Collaborate) - NOT MATCH
43. Human Performance Technology principles - NOT MATCH
44. Flipped classroom (blended) - NOT MATCH
45. Mobile application development - NOT MATCH
46. Desktop publishing software (e.g. PageMaker) - NOT MATCH
47. Web authoring tools (e.g. Dreamweaver) - NOT MATCH
48. Operating system software (e.g. Windows 7) - NOT MATCH
